TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BlobServiceResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a BlobService along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetBlobServiceResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetBlobService method.

Docs.param: The name of the blob container within the specified storage account. Blob container names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.
Docs.exception: is an empty string, and was expected to be non-empty.
